meanings.definition: The action of looking back on or reviewing past events or situations.
meanings.sent1: In my retrospection, I remembered the fun times we had at the park.
meanings.sent2: Her retrospection on her childhood brought back many happy memories.
meanings.sent3: During retrospection, I realized I used to wear mismatched socks to school.
meanings.sent4: His retrospection on the failed project made him more cautious in the future.
meanings.sent5: Through retrospection, she uncovered the root cause of her anxiety.

meanings.definition: The act of contemplating the past.
meanings.sent1: Retrospection helps us learn from our mistakes and grow.
meanings.sent2: His daily retrospection before bed helped him find peace of mind.
meanings.sent3: During retrospection, she imagined what life would be like in the 1800s.
meanings.sent4: The artist's retrospection of his early works inspired his new collection.
meanings.sent5: Through retrospection, he understood the importance of family in his life.
